name: Relaxing Farming Sim
description:
Plant, water, craft repeat. Welcome to the world of relaxing farming sim! Take your time to build up your farm, spend some time crafting, and build the ultimate farm!

WASD - move

Left click - Perform Action

Right click - Open/close menu

MouseWheel/Q/E - Swap tools

Left Shift - eat food (when applicable)

Just beware of the horrible night beasts....
